pages.text: $(thing)TerraFirmaCraft$() is one of the core mods in this pack, and it replaces almost everything about $(thing)vanilla Minecraft$().$(2br)You may have already noticed there are a plentiful amount of $(item)rocks$() and $(item)sticks$() strewn across the ground. These can be picked up by $(thing)right-clicking$() them.

One of the first things to craft is $(thing)TerraFirmaCraft$()'s guide book. This is an additional book which explains the new progression and systems added by the mod, such as $(thing)knapping$(), $(thing)heating$(), and $(thing)anvils$().$(2br)Keep it with you for reference on your adventures, as the information inside is crucial to your survival.
